## ParsedToken.firebase property

Firebase specific claims, containing the provider(s) used to authenticate the user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
'firebase'?: {
        'sign_in_provider'?: string;
        'sign_in_second_factor'?: string;
    };
```
